root.name: Hasbro Family Game Night 4: The Game Show
root.description: GamesCONNECT 4 BasketballSCRABBLE FlashSORRY! SlidersYAHTZEE! BowlingBOP-IT BoptigonMONOPOLY Crazy Cash MachineOverviewConnect 4 Basketball plays in the same manner as seen in the TV show.Family Game Night 4: The Game Show is the fourth installment of the Family Game Night series. In this fourth installment, players can play games inspired by the hit TV show on The Hub including Scrabble Flash, Sorry! Sliders, Connect 4 Basketball and more. Fans of the TV show will love this game.
